titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7006) making further consolidated appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7006) making further consolidated appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-445, by Ms. Foxx.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 7006 with 1 hour of general debate. Motion to recommit allowed. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 54.
